attributes.title: Be Loose & Shed Ego (A Discourse delivered at Inner Awakening & LBE)
attributes.description:
From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this discourse delivered to participants of the 2nd Inner Awakening program in Bidadi on June 18, 2009, Swamiji sheds new light on the subject of Ego.  By being "loose" he gives us an ultimate technique to she ego and be liberated,  

The next Inner Awakening program will be held in Bidadi from December 2-23, 2009.  More information on the program and registration is available at www.dhyanapeetam.org.
